topic.title: [Reshade] Pascal "Marty McFly" Gilcher RTGI Shader
topic.body:
Alright guys, since I've seen many ask for it on r/drownedmods , I wanted to release the RTGI Shader v0.20 here for you so that it may hopefully stay up forever.

Download link (0.20.0): https://mega.nz/file/lg0UGCZD#SWNg5pixX2wIjwHgtvclJ_uGq68pkXzySoHrPnchil8
Download link (0.20.1): https://mega.nz/file/lhlCTCDL#S-vsoNcyY8RUmC08tnlwEqSOo0w5mjgzPf3X81xkipU

topic.title: Fallout 4 Creation Club Content (All Packs)
topic.body:
Here is a link to the Creation Club Content Packs, all of them should be there. If the link ever goes down, I will update it with a new one.

Google Drive with all Packs: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1vQDI15lOdWuPsZ8d6lLT_pX9ylIDMfLN

1613095634_13jhF2MVnbsU3qfMgcq8GYJpqwcmb.body: I will try to keep this post updated with the new versions of the shader once I get my hands on them.
